snippet: The Oglala Sioux Tribe will propose lifting an alcohol ban on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation as a way to regulate the flow and reduce alcohol problems.
abstract: Oglala Sioux Tribe officials announce they will propose lifting alcohol ban on Pine Ridge Indian Reservation in South Dakota as way to regulate flow of beer and malt liquor onto the reservation, which has been plagued by alcohol problems.
lead_paragraph: The Oglala Sioux Tribe will propose lifting an alcohol ban on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation as a way to regulate the flow and reduce alcohol problems.

headline.seo: The Oglala Sioux Tribe Considers Lifting Alcohol Ban in South Dakota
headline.main: Tribe Considers Lifting Alcohol Ban in South Dakota
headline.print_headline: Tribe Considers Lifting Alcohol Ban in South Dakota
